name: Witches at Summer's End
description:
Summer is ending and nothing can last forever. The Admiralo Island Witches Club meets up for one last adventure before fall begins.

Witches at Summer's End is a visual novel about friendship, empathy and witches.

story, character art, scripting cloverfirefly (tumblr)

backgrounds Robin Kaplan (tumblr)

Updates

3-28-2017 - Big update! The story no longer ends on a cliffhanger and goes all the way to the end. Also some basic proofreading that I didn't have time for during the resist jam.
